thread.title: Search for Barnsley's mystery millionaire
thread.title_full: Search for Barnsley's mystery millionaire | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Search for Barnsley's mystery millionaire
text:
Credit: Press Association The hunt is on for an unsuspecting millionaire in Barnsley.
A ticket for the National Lottery draw on the 31st January was bought in the town, but has not yet been claimed.
The search is now on to find the owner of the winning ticket and players in the area are being urged to check their unique Millionaire Maker code.
The winning code on Tuesday, January 31 for this prize was TWPG 84490 and the lucky ticket holder has until July 30 to claim their prize.
Last updated Mon 20 Feb 2017 Money Barnsley South Yorkshire
